Starice/Khonkolor/Alpha Dolphy::

Khonkolor went towards Epyon was "Poor bird!!! I think that he will 
loose all his lives this time!!!"

"SHUT UP KHONKOLOR!!!!" Screammed Starice while she landed "They 
capture him alive, so they must want reprogram him or something like 
that.. Sir" said kindly Starice to Epyon "Other Maximal woke up 
before we left the ship... She.. I though that she was so weak to 
come with us so she's monitoring the computers... She can help us to 
find Condor..." she Opened her comm link "Alpha Dolphy, do you copy?"

"I'm here I'm ready to left the ship..." enswered the femme

"Stay there, decepticons took Condor prisioner... we need find their 
base??? can you follow COndor's signature???"

"It's a piece of cake" said Alpha. "I'm working in it..."





--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He droped off the sword before it could het Cheetor. Then a maximal

on
> his chest.
> "I'm a Maximal!"
> The the shot from the cyclone gun came in. Hot Rod, with his back
> boosters, jumped out of the way. He wasn't letting Skullgrin off 
without
> a fight. He shot two signature seeking missiles at Skullgrin.
> 
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He heard the reports over the comm.
> "StarJumper crew concentrait on the one that took condor! We must 
get
> him back!"
> He then noticed that the bot was gone.
> "Noooooooooo!"
